long_description: Celebrate the 40th anniversary of Osprey with the special edition Osprey Daylite Daypack. It attaches to all Osprey AddOn(TM)-series travel packs and lets you explore your destination with ease. Simple yet sturdy, the Osprey Daylite 40th Anniversary Edition daypack is ideal for hiking, traveling and commuting. Lightly padded mesh shoulder straps have an integrated carry handle; straps and simple webbing hipbelt tuck away when pack is attached to a larger travel pack (not included). Panel-loading main compartment is large enough for a lightweight jacket, binoculars and guide book. Interior sleeve can hold a tablet or hydration reservoir (not included). Mesh-covered back panel with slotted foam protects your back from pack contents and breathes well. Front pocket features a mesh organizer and key clip; side mesh pockets stow water bottles or snacks. Daylite attaches to all Osprey AddOn(TM)-series packs, including the Aether/Ariel, Volt/Viva, Shuttle and Sojourn, and the Poco/Poco Plus child carriers.
short_description: Celebrate the 40th anniversary of Osprey with the special edition Osprey Daylite Daypack. It attaches to all Osprey AddOn(TM)-series travel packs and lets you explore your destination with ease.
